name: Inga Ouhou: Murderous Plaza
storyline:
New job. Old town. All your new roommates are murderers.
Serial Killers. The Zodiac. A new start. A fun and mysterious revenge adventure.

The year is 2021, a turbulent time. The world has been infested with a plague and law and order is reshaped. Our protagonist, member of an obscure underground idol group, retires from her job and becomes a real member of society. The goal: independence.

However, city life is not as easy as it seems. Workplace trouble, reports of suspicious people, mental and physical exhaustion and sleepless nights: she struggles to find value in city life. After successfully escaping her company, she looks for a place to live peacefully. There she finds the Red Rum Plaza.

"I heard if you kill a God who killed a Goddess, your wishes will be granted."
... Such fairy tales are often told in the countryside. In lovely shitholes with skyscraper-free skies. This is where our protagonist finds herself.

Such a perfect apartment seemed more than suspicious. But not a single stain could be found, on both the building and its history. She hits it off with the friendly landlord, Ram Hinome and decides to move into the apartment, unable to turn down such a safe, reasonably priced abode. After greeting the other residents and finding a new place to work, our protagonist is to finally enjoy a peaceful night...
That is, until she sees Ram Hinome committing murder.
summary: This is a game about the 12 Star Signs x Blood Thirsty Killers x Communal Life.
